sample_docs: Banking and Investment Management Solutions Enterprise Data Management Solutions Public Service Delivery Solutions Fincore works closely with its clients to establish the real issue and offers advice, recommendations and technology to resolve it. Backed up by yearsof expertise, Fincore specialises in transforming its clients' requirements into a flexibly designed solution, making use of the years of experience in the market plus the development and implementation of sophisticated software solutions. Technology and expertise designed to give clients a leading edge. By undertaking continuous dialogue with its clients, and backed by dedicated investment in R&D, Fincore is constantly evolving its software solutions designed to provide cost-effective responses to the unique business challenges clients face. Fincore develops software solutions in the context of the full trade and commercial cycle. These include connectivity to external parties and systems and compliance - all designed to give clients a leading edge in their market. Fincore meets its clients' needs with a full range of solutions ... Banking and Investement Management Solutions Finsoft Financial System's coverage of this area is centered on three subjects Primary and secondary trading tools Financial Instrument Databases and Data Quality Management Risk Management In each area the products incorporate knowledge and experience gained first hand on the trading floors of some of the major investment banks in the City of London. This experience has provided us with a unique and profound understanding of all aspects of the business trading processes, and we have utilized this understanding in the design and implementation of our products. The result is superior performance and simplification of processes leading to higher efficiency and lower costs Our clients can therefore benefit not only from superior products, but from a total business relationship, based on solid understanding of the clients' business processes, and which therefore aims at helping them run their businesses in the most optimal fashion ... Enterprise Data Management Solutions Data at the core of key business processes is a resource critical to the survival and health of most organisations today. Protecting the integrity, security and quality of this type of data has become an important item on the agenda for many C-level senior executives. The challenge many organisations face is to protect the integrity, security and quality of core business data about key parts of their business such as customers, products, markets, channels, prices and schedules while at the same time allowing their business processes to meet the challenges of outsourcing, streamlining, flatter and more flexible organisations and greater customer involvement. Fincore provides an integrated EDM solution platform which can protect the integrity, security and quality of the complete range of core business data of a wide range of enterpises including banking, financial services, media, publishing and retail. Wether it is customers, products, markets, channels, prices or other key parts of a business the Fincore EDM solution platform allows core business data to be co-ordinated and controlled throughout an entire enterprise or even across several enterprises in real time. Fincore provides a range of off the shelf solution modules dealing with common types of data. ... The Collaborative Business Portal (CBP) is Finsoft's award winning system for business collaboration and real-time workflow management. The system has won the BAE Systems' Chairman's Award for Innovation 2003 for its innovative and user friendly contribution to increasing productivity. In projects at BAE Systems plc and EADS Astrium Ltd the system has enabled significant productivity increases (up to 70%), dramatic cycle time reductions (typically 30%) and helped create transparency and predictability in otherwise opaque processes. CBP is a completely generic collaboration and workflow management tool, which is applicable to any collaboration process, which need to improve its productivity and management transparency. It is readily adaptable to the needs of very diverse sectors, such as:Public administration Engineering design and manufacturing Construction Software development Insurance & Banking CBP is available both as a traditional licensed software installation and as a hosted ... Public and Professional Service Delivery Solutions Many public services from allocation of social housing or other social services and benefits all the way to business oriented services such planning permission or the granting and monitoring of operating licenses for certain types of business all require non routine case based working involving several professionals and often even several departments or even organisations. This is very different from standardised routine service processes like those provided by bank teller staff, check-in desks or common sales and customer service help desks. One of the main challenges for case based public services is that each case has some unique aspects and requires the professional skills and judgment of the case worker and other professionals involved. Another key challenge is the fact that case based work frequently requires several agencies or organisations to deliver a joined up and co-ordinated service under tight time and budget contraints to achieve the required outcomes. At the same time service users and the public expect both fair treatment and transparency of decisions especially where they have a major impact on an individual life, on businesses or the community as a whole. Fincore's Public and Professional Service solution addresses all these challenges and provides a secure, flexible and intuitive platform for case work based services within public and government organisations as well as organisations in the voluntary and and professional services sector facing similar ...

BIOMETRICS Use the power of biometrics to protect players and your business. Empower your business with cutting-edge Facial Recognition and Biometrics solutions to enhance security, efficiency, and customer insight, all customised to your needs by our expert team. Facial Recognition Protect your business, strengthen gambling safety and gain valuable player insights with our powerful facial recognition software. Our truly omnichannel solution combines facial recognition with rules based actions, real-time data and reporting to provide actionable insights for your business. Two Factor Authentication Promote secure and responsible gambling with Fincore's secure 2FA (two-factor authentication) powered by facial recognition technology and artificial intelligence. Ensure only authorised users, can make payments or place bets. ID Scanner Speed up your ID verification process. Our AI powered system compares images from an identification document, such as a driver's license, with a picture of a real person and verifies the identity. WHY FINCORE? We have deep, long lasting relationships with our customers. Committed to their success, we are trusted to deliver. TRI PAY Not just a partnership, working with Fincore is like having an extension of your own team. Committed, highly collaborative, challenging and supportive. We can propel you to new heights. PARTNERSHIP PEOPLE TRI PAY Our people thrive on challenge. With an innovative and fearless spirit, we tackle any obstacle, believing that nothing is too hard to overcome. Our high-energy culture drives us to excel; with the best technology and product talent, we always deliver. TRI PAY With 25+ years experience of creating solutions for Sportsbetting, Gaming, iLottery & Fintechs, we know how to get things done. And if it's not been done before, we know how to find a way. KNOW-HOW FUTURE TECH TRI PAY We believe in technology and it's transformative power. We are at the cutting edge and will always strive to give our customers advantage by optimising our solutions with the best technology. TRI PAY Reliability is in our DNA. We act with transparency and integrity. We don't make excuses, and we always deliver, on-time. TRUST WHY FINCORE? We have deep, long lasting relationships with our customers. TRI SPORTSBOOK PROFESSIONAL SERVICES Solve your biggest challenges with our Expert Professional Services for Sports-betting, Gaming, and Lottery Operators. Support Services Our bespoke Support Services can provide expert support tailored to your specific needs. From resolving technical issues to providing guidance on regulatory compliance, we've got you covered, allowing you to focus on what matters most – delivering an exceptional experience to your customers. Customisation Services Stand out from the competition and create a truly unique experience with our Software Customisation services. We understand that every operator has distinct branding and business objectives. Our talented team of developers will work closely with you to customise the software to align with your vision. From user interface enhancements to tailor-made features and functionalities. Integration Services Seamless integration is the key to optimising your business processes and achieving efficiency. Our Integration Services team specialise in integrating your existing systems with cutting-edge technologies, ensuring smooth and hassle-free data flow across platforms. Whether you need to connect gaming platforms, payment gateways, or CRM systems, our experts will customise and implement solutions tailored to your unique requirements. Hosting & Security Reliable and secure hosting is essential for the uninterrupted operation of your gaming platform. Our Hosting Solutions provide state-of-the-art infrastructure designed to handle the demands of your business. With our robust servers and advanced security measures, you can rest assured that your data is safe and your platform is always available to your users. TRI HUB The cutting edge platform where Player Account Management, Payments, and Bonus converge, providing you with a unified real-time view of each player. PAM PAY BON Unlock the full potential of your customers with a comprehensive suite of tools designed to create a seamless customer experience, while maximizing player engagement and satisfaction. With rule setting and automation at it's core, TRI HUB efficiently handles routine interactions, freeing your team to concentrate on exceptional cases where their expertise shines. TRI HUB A comprehensive, end-to-end view of each player. Enabling you to track and analyse all player events with real-time data, empowering you to take swift and decisive action. Boost efficiency by automating the majority of tasks through rule setting, allowing you to prioritise exceptional cases. Stay fully compliant with our comprehensive suite of compliance, regulatory, and responsible gambling tools. Integrate TRI HUB into your preferred platforms, including CRM, Sportsbook, Gaming Server, and more, for a seamless and cohesive operational environment.
